response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be an invaluable asset to you, potentially increasing its value to you by up to 50%. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $13,500. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its actual value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 13500}
